messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Shinsengumi "Shura no toki" Bittorent
messages.msgSnippet: I ve seen 8 eps so far and it s pretty good. It s switching off into the later 1600s with Yagyu Jubei now. Another series, although not Shinsengumi, that has
messages.messageBody:
I've seen 8 eps so far and it's pretty good. It's switching off into the later 1600s with Yagyu Jubei now.


Another series, although not Shinsengumi, that has just been released is Samurai 7. It's sorta futuristic remake of Akira Kurosawa's Seven Samurai. 2 eps out and so far i'm enjoying it.


----- Original Message -----
From: secretary
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 2004 3:41 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Shinsengumi "Shura no toki" Bittorent


A silent member of our SHQ ML would like to announce that
the anime Shura no toki which will depict the Shinsengumi (Okita
specifically)...currently the series is still in the Musashi
portion...is available on Bittorent
http://a.scarywater.net/lunar/
so for those you who have torrent software...let us know if its good ^_^
